title: Sandakkozhi Song Lyrics Ayitha Ezhuthu
stanzas:
Sanda kodi kodi
iva sanda kodi
konjam thadava thadava
iva sondha kozhiyaam(2)

ne rendu mulathula
paaya podaiyaa
sanda vandhucha
thalli padumaiyaa(2)

konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaa ...
konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaa yaa
konja neram enna kollaiyaa

Vaangi pota veththala
sevakkanum saami
vaayi muththam kodutha
sevandhirum saami
sorga puram pognum
nalla vazhi kaami

konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaa ahhh...
konja neram enna kollaiyaa

Sanda kodi kodi
iva sanda kodi
konjam thadava thadava
iva sondha kozhiyaam(2)

Machu veedu venaam
mettu kattu podhum
metha edhum venaam
patha paayi podhum

mookkuthiyin pon keeththu
rathirikku podhum
oh saiva muththam koduthaa
oththu poga maatten
saagatha kaattu
seththu poga maatten

konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaa ahhh...
konja neram enna kollaiyaa

Sanda kodi kodi
iva sanda kodi
konjam thadava thadava
iva sondha kozhiyaam(2)

ne rendu mulathula
paaya podaiyaa
sanda vandhucha
thalli padumaiyaa(2)

konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaahh ...
konja neram enna kollaiyaa
ayyaaa yaa
konja neram enna kollaiyaa

seo.title: Sandakkozhi Song Lyrics Ayitha Ezhuthu
seo.description: Get the complete Sandakkozhi Song Lyrics Ayitha Ezhuthu from Aayitha Ezhuthu. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Madhusree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Aayitha Ezhuthu, AR Rahman, Madhusree, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
